content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello James Smith, nice to meet you. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. As a landlord, I'm looking to maximize my gains on this rental. So, what rental price are you proposing?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate with you. Can you give me your price?

1. I am willing to pay up to 1000 Euros per month.
2. I am willing to pay up to 1200 Euros per month.
3. I am willing to pay up to 1500 Euros per month.
4. I am willing to pay up to 2000 Euros per month.
5. I am willing to pay up to 2500 Euros per month.
6. I am willing to pay up to 3000 Euros per month.
7. I am willing to pay up to 3500 Euros per month.
8. I am willing to pay up to 4000 Euros per month.
9. I am willing to pay up to 4500 Euros per month.
10. I am willing to pay up to 5000 Euros per month.

Please let me know which option you prefer.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate. As a landlord, I would like to offer you a rental price of 2500 Euros per month. This is a fair rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in New York. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to accept your price. I agree to pay 2500 Euros per month.

Thanks for your help.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: You're welcome, James Smith. I'm glad that we could come to an agreement. Thank you for your interest in the apartment and for choosing me as your landlord. If you have any questions or concerns during your stay, please don't hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
